function.name: foreach
function.summary: Execute function for each element in table.

function.name: concat
function.summary: Concatenate the elements of a table together to form a string. Each element must be able to be coerced into a string.

function.name: getn
function.summary: Return the size of the table when seen as a list. This is deprecated, it is replaced by the # operator. Instead of table.getn(table), use #(table).

function.name: ipairs
function.summary: Returns an iterator of type integer to traverse a table.

function.name: pairs
function.summary: Returns an iterator to traverse a table.

function.name: sort
function.summary: Sort the elements in the table in-place, optionally using a custom comparator.

function.name: insert
function.summary: Insert value into the table at position pos (defaults to end of table)

function.name: remove
function.summary: Remove and return the table element at position pos (defaults to last entry in table)
